if(NOT "${IREE_TARGET_BACKEND_VULKAN-SPIRV}")
  return()
endif()

iree_add_all_subdirs()

file(GLOB _GLOB_X_MLIR LIST_DIRECTORIES false RELATIVE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} CONFIGURE_DEPENDS *.mlir)
iree_lit_test_suite(
  NAME
    lit
  SRCS
    "${_GLOB_X_MLIR}"
  DATA
    iree::tools::IreeFileCheck
    iree::tools::iree-opt
)
